ConversationMessageDefinition.label: How To Sell Cryptocurrency Mobile App

primitiveValues.formulaTemplate:
To place a market buy order using the Ndax mobile app, follow these steps:
1. Log in to the Ndax app. 2. On the bottom navigation bar, tap the round Ndax logo 3. Tap Trade 4. From the top of the screen, tap on the BTC-CAD trading pair to show the list of cryptos 5. Tap Sell at the bottom left 6. Enter the Order Size in the crypto, or the Order Value (CAD) 7. Tap Sell 8. Review the Order Confirmation and tap Confirm Selling
